metadata.title: ClientSeeker - Professional Customer Development Tool | Find Restaurant Beauty Salon Auto Repair Clients Fast
metadata.description: ClientSeeker is a professional global customer development tool that integrates Google Maps, Gaode Maps, and Baidu Maps to help sales teams quickly find restaurant, beauty salon, auto repair, and other business contact information to accelerate business growth.
metadata.keywords: client development tool, customer acquisition software, business contact search, lead generation, B2B sales tool, prospect finder, restaurant client finder, beauty salon leads, auto repair customers, healthcare leads, retail business contacts, telemarketing tool, international trade leads, sales prospecting, business directory, contact database, Google Maps integration, Gaode Maps, Baidu Maps, ClientSeeker

search.page_title: ClientSeeker - Professional Customer Development Tool | Find Restaurant Beauty Salon Auto Repair Clients Fast
search.page_description: ClientSeeker integrates Google Maps, Gaode Maps, and Baidu Maps to professionally provide restaurant, beauty salon, auto repair and other industry customer contact search services, helping sales teams acquire customers quickly.
search.search_placeholder: Enter target customer industry or keywords, such as: restaurant, beauty salon, auto repair shop...
search.try_different_keywords: Please try other industry keywords or adjust search region
search.google_maps_export_note: Google Maps data does not support export, only online viewing is supported
search.comprehensive_description: By integrating authoritative data sources such as Gaode Maps, Baidu Maps, Google Maps, etc., we can help you quickly locate potential customers in target industries worldwide,
search.get_complete_contact: obtaining complete enterprise contact information to accelerate your business development.
search.multi_source_integration: Integrate multiple authoritative data sources to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of contact information
search.global_coverage: Integrate Gaode Maps, Baidu Maps, Google Maps and other data sources to support global business information query
search.high_accuracy: We integrate multiple authoritative data sources and use intelligent algorithms for deduplication and verification. The accuracy rate of contact information exceeds 85%. The system will prioritize displaying merchants with phone numbers to ensure that the contact information obtained is authentic and effective.
search.start_search_instruction: Enter target customer industry or keywords, select region, and start getting customer contact information
search.comprehensive_service_description: ClientSeeker is based on multi-source data integration technology to provide precise global customer contact information acquisition services for sales teams, marketing personnel, and business owners. By integrating authoritative data sources such as Gaode Maps, Baidu Maps, Google Maps, etc., we can help you quickly locate potential customers in target industries worldwide, obtain accurate enterprise contact information, and significantly improve the success rate of domestic and international business expansion.
search.what_is_description: ClientSeeker is a professional global customer development tool that supports business contact information queries in mainland China and overseas markets
search.how_to_use_clientseeker: How to Use ClientSeeker to Find Customers?
search.search_time_estimate: Getting contact phone numbers for each customer, estimated 30-60 seconds

step1.title: Enter Search Keywords
step1.description: Enter target industry or business type in the search box, such as 'restaurant', 'beauty salon', 'auto repair shop', etc.

step2.title: Select Target Region
step2.description: Use the region selector to precisely locate provinces, cities, and counties. The system will automatically identify your current location

step3.title: Get Customer Information
step3.description: Click the search button, and the system will automatically retrieve target customer contact information, supporting CSV file export

precise_search.title: Precise Search
precise_search.description: Support industry keyword search, covering major cities and regions worldwide, accurately targeting customer groups

contact_retrieval.description: Obtain key contact information such as business phone numbers and addresses, with smart deduplication optimization prioritizing effective contact information

multi_source.description: Integrate multiple data sources including Gaode Maps, Baidu Maps, Google Maps, etc., supporting global business information queries

data_export.description: Domestic data supports one-click CSV export, Google Maps data can be viewed and used online

geo_location.title: Geographic Positioning
geo_location.description: Intelligently identify user location, support precise geographic range search down to county level

quality_rating.title: Quality Assessment
quality_rating.description: Display merchant ratings and category information to help filter high-quality potential customers

search.industry_tip: üí° Tip: Enter these industry keywords in the search box to quickly find corresponding potential customers

legal_compliance.question: ‚ùì Is ClientSeeker's data source legal and compliant?
legal_compliance.answer: Yes, all data comes from publicly accessible business directories, map services, and enterprise registration information. We strictly comply with relevant regulations such as the Data Security Law and Personal Information Protection Law, and do not involve any privacy data acquisition.

accuracy_rate.question: ‚ùì What is the accuracy rate of search results?
accuracy_rate.answer: We integrate multiple authoritative data sources and use intelligent algorithms for deduplication and verification. The contact information accuracy rate exceeds 85%. The system prioritizes displaying merchants with phone numbers to ensure the contact information obtained is authentic and effective.

batch_export.question: ‚ùì Does it support batch export of customer data?
batch_export.answer: Yes. You can export search results to CSV format files with one click, including customer names, addresses, contact phones, ratings and other information, convenient for further analysis and management in Excel.

usage_precautions.question: ‚ùì What should I pay attention to when using ClientSeeker?
usage_precautions.answer: Please be sure to comply with anti-spam laws and regulations and respect customer privacy. The obtained contact information should only be used for legitimate business purposes and must not be used for harassment, fraud and other illegal activities. It is recommended to clearly state your identity and purpose when contacting customers.

improve_search.question: ‚ùì How to improve search results?
improve_search.answer: It is recommended to use specific industry keywords, such as 'Sichuan cuisine restaurant' instead of 'restaurant'; select specific geographic areas instead of entire provinces; try multiple related keyword combinations for more comprehensive results.

data_update.question: ‚ùì How often is the data updated?
data_update.answer: Our data is updated weekly to ensure timeliness. Newly opened businesses will appear in search results within 1-2 weeks, and closed business information will be cleaned up promptly.

export_limitations.question: Are there any limitations on data export?
export_limitations.answer: Data export functionality has different support levels based on data sources:

china_data.title: Mainland China Data
china_data.description: Business data from Gaode Maps and Baidu Maps supports CSV format export with complete contact information

google_data.title: Google Maps Data
google_data.description: Global business data from Google Maps does not currently support export but can be viewed and used online

data_accuracy.question: How is data accuracy guaranteed?
data_accuracy.answer: We employ multiple measures to ensure data quality:
measures: Multi-source data cross-validation with intelligent deduplication to ensure information uniqueness
Prioritize displaying high-quality business information with phone numbers
Regularly update database to ensure information timeliness
